list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a crustacean with a broad carapace, stalked eyes, and five pairs of legs, the first pair of which are modified as pincers. Crabs are abundant on many shores, especially in the tropics, where some have become adapted to life on land.
a louse that infests human body hair, especially in the genital region, causing extreme irritation.
a machine for picking up and lifting heavy weights.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he began crabbing sideways across the roof
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh bắt đầu còi qua mái nhà

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: watermen were crabbing on the bay
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những cây dưa chuột đang cò trên vịnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: on picnics, I would crab about sand in my food
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: trên những buổi dã ngoại, tôi sẽ cua về cát trong thức ăn của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you're trying to crab my act
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn đang cố gắng cua hành động của mình
